newsitem.title: JAPAN: Thai finance chiefs to meet Japan business leaders.
newsitem.headline: Thai finance chiefs to meet Japan business leaders.

text.p: Thai Finance Minister Thanong Bidaya and Bank of Thailand (BOT) Governor Rerngchai Marakanond will meet senior officials of Japan's powerful business lobby the Federation of Economic Organisations (Keidanren) on Friday, Keidanren officials said on Thursday.
The official said it will be an informal lucheon meeting lasting about two hours from noon.
Thanong and Rerngchai arrived in Tokyo on Wednesday for a visit until Friday.
The two Thai officials are expected to discuss with Japanese business leaders and bankers the situation after the de facto devaluation of the Thai baht earlier this month.
But Japanese bankers said on Thursday that Thanong did not ask for new support from Japanese banks during his meeting earlier with representatives of Japanese commercial banks.
